sentences.english: Finally, for his collection of short stories of "Works Strange Record" study.
sentences.chinese: 最後是對牛嶠所編的小說集《靈怪錄》的研究。

sentences.english: For the first album, it was mostly my tracks.
sentences.chinese: 但是第一張專輯裏大部分錄的是我的音。

sentences.english: My favorites are video clips of people doing insanely un-human things.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的就是看人做一些不像人能做得到的錄影片。

sentences.english: The first installment of class fee after enrolment must be paid by cheque.
sentences.chinese: 獲取錄後，首次團費必須以支票繳付。

sentences.english: I do certainly and I just want to go on the record here.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定會祈禱的，我只是想繼續錄今天的節目。

sentences.english: The Group recorded two albums since Sanchez's addition.
sentences.chinese: 派特馬斯尼的樂隊在桑切斯加入以後錄了兩盤專輯。

sentences.english: Recorded in the words of their book "History of Zhou chapter" and named.
sentences.chinese: 因其着錄於字書《史籀篇》而得名。

sentences.english: Recorded for a friend on fanfiction. net.
H. E. Stanley, Introduction to Phase Transitions and Critical Phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 於錄，郝柏林，陳曉松相變與臨界現象。

sentences.english: Charlie smiled rather sheepishly and said, "I still have my list."
sentences.chinese: 查理羞怯地微笑着說，“我仍然保存着我的讚賞錄。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the different formations of the disyllabic words in You Ming Lu, an anthology in Nan dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南朝小說《幽明錄》的複音詞有多種構詞方式。

sentences.english: UberProAudio: Did the band use any different guitar gear in the studio during the recording of the new album?
sentences.chinese: 錄這張新專輯的時候你們用了什麼不同的器材嗎？

sentences.english: I think Dana recorded this in Lawson's office, listen.
sentences.chinese: 我猜是戴娜是在勞森的辦公室錄的，你聽。
她意外地抹去了錄了音的磁帶。

sentences.english: Tim and Tom taped two tom- toms together.
sentences.chinese: 提姆和湯姆一起錄了兩支印第安手鼓歌。

sentences.english: The compression ratios were noted from individual products' log files.
sentences.chinese: 壓縮比是從單個產品的日誌文件標記錄出來的。
